version_description: Login using your account number and PIN or Password.  You will no longer use your previously created username and password to login.  All of your current app settings and controls will remain the same.  The rotating banner images have also been updated.

We’ve fixed the notification icon so that the notification count matches the unseen transactions.

Click the Tell Me More button at the bottom of each screen to get more information about a control or alert.

Added biometric authentication.

We have enhanced the push notification alerts to show additional details about a transaction, including why a transaction was declined.

We’ve added the ability to one-time override a denied transaction without having to change the card controls that are already in place. If a transaction was denied by a Card Guard control, just tap to authorize the one-time override and swipe the card again within 10 minutes to approve the transaction.
